item.title: Zebra
item.author: ssphugo@srkn.anonaddy.com (Srikanth Perinkulam)
item.description: We’d asked the kids to find out why a zebra is black and white in colour. Ali - A kid who was in a marathi medium school until last year, comes up with this paper the next day. ‘Zebra mothe is black and waite. The zebra is black and wate. Jab upar wale ne usko aise kar diya, vo kya karega’
